title: google pixel 4a whatsapp notification doesn't show up during lock screen
content: When i lock my phone, and the screen goes completely dark, notification or message from whatsapp does not shows up. My phone does vibrate but my screen is still completely dark, no light or notification at all. All my others notification having the same issue, gmail all these. Before switching to 4a my previous android is able to show me the notification and messages and I can even reply without unlocking my phone. I have already tried many differents setting, both phone and whatsapp notification setting but unable to get it work.
